short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notifies you if you're using your browser on the weekend

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that notifies you if you're using your browser over the weekend. It works even if your browser is just open and running in the background.
